text: 3.24 Lom 5.1, Epe 1.7, 2.8, Kol 1.14, 1 Ti 2.6, 1 Pi 1.18-19 God chɨnop mɨdupsek yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gup. Yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gek, God ayɨp jɨmñɨl mɨdɨl binɨb tep ne takaw ma mɨdeb okok yonɨgun tek lup. Chɨn tap ogɨnap gon ne chɨnop anɨb ma gup. Klays Jisas nop monmon agyoken kɨlop pɨsnep dek koŋɨm amnɨgel agɨl gos nɨŋɨd anɨgak.
